definition: characteristic of or befitting a friend, troops belonging to or allied with your own military forces
details:
adjective
- characteristic of or befitting a friend
= example: characteristic of or befitting a friend
- of or belonging to your own country's forces or those of an ally
= example: of or belonging to your own country's forces or those of an ally
- easy to understand or use
= example: easy to understand or use
- inclined to help or support
= synonyms: favorable
noun
- troops belonging to or allied with your own military forces
